hero.subtitle: Connecting global medical innovation with local healthcare needs. Access to essential medication is not a privilege ‚Äî it's a human right.

about.title: Bridging Healthcare Gaps
about.description1: HAC-PHARMA (Rabitat Al Seha Company) established its headquarters in Riyadh, marking the genesis of its venture in the region. This strategic move allows the company to efficiently manage and oversee its network in key markets, including the USA, Europe, Egypt, India, and China.
about.description2: By centralizing operations in KSA, the company aims to foster better coordination and streamline its services across all locations, enhancing communication and synergy among its international teams.
about.philosophyDescription: At HAC-PHARMA (Rabitat Al Seha Company), we believe access to essential medication is not a privilege ‚Äî it's a human right. Our philosophy is rooted in compassion, innovation, and responsiveness. We are committed to:
about.headquartersDescription: Headquartered in Riyadh with virtual offices across 5 continents
about.missionText: To deliver life-saving and life-enhancing medical solutions by bridging access gaps, accelerating product availability, and empowering healthcare systems through strategic innovation and regulatory excellence.
about.visionText: A region where every patient receives timely, reliable, and effective treatment, powered by a forward-thinking medical network that anticipates needs, acts with compassion, and leads with integrity.

hero.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive range of high-quality medical products.

list.title: CardioPlus
list.description: Advanced cardiovascular support for hypertension management.

list.title: OncoShield
list.description: Targeted therapy solution for solid tumor treatment.

list.title: NeuroCalm
list.description: Neurological support for anxiety and stress disorders.

list.title: DermaGlow
list.description: Clinical grade dermatology treatment for eczema.

list.title: DermaSoft
list.description: Gentle daily care for sensitive skin conditions.

contact.title: Need more information?
contact.text: Contact our medical affairs team for detailed clinical information.

p1.fullDesc: CardioPlus is a state-of-the-art antihypertensive medication designed to provide 24-hour blood pressure control with a single daily dose. Its unique formulation ensures steady drug release, minimizing side effects and maximizing patient compliance.
p1.dosage: One tablet daily, preferably in the morning. Can be taken with or without food.

p2.fullDesc: OncoShield is a targeted therapy designed to treat specific solid tumors by inhibiting key pathways involved in cancer cell proliferation and survival. It represents a significant advancement in precision oncology.
p2.dosage: Administered orally twice daily. Dosage adjustment may be required based on patient tolerance.

p3.fullDesc: NeuroCalm provides relief for generalized anxiety disorder and panic disorders. It works by balancing neurotransmitter levels in the brain to promote a sense of calm and well-being without significant sedation.
p3.dosage: Starting dose is 10mg once daily. May be increased to 20mg based on clinical response.

p4.fullDesc: DiabeCare offers a comprehensive approach to type 2 diabetes management. It improves insulin sensitivity and reduces glucose production by the liver, helping patients achieve their HbA1c targets.
p4.dosage: Taken with meals to reduce gastrointestinal side effects. Dosage is individualized.

p5.fullDesc: DermaGlow is a topical treatment for mild to moderate eczema. Its non-steroidal formula effectively reduces inflammation and itching while restoring the skin's natural barrier.
p5.dosage: Apply a thin layer to affected areas twice daily.

p6.fullDesc: CardioMax is a high-potency statin used to lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of cardiovascular events. It is indicated for patients with hyperlipidemia and those at high risk of heart disease.

p7.fullDesc: OncoDefend is an immunotherapy agent that boosts the body's immune system to fight cancer cells. It is used in the treatment of various advanced malignancies.

p8.fullDesc: NeuroFlex is indicated for the treatment of neuropathic pain associated with diabetic peripheral neuropathy and postherpetic neuralgia. It also aids in the management of fibromyalgia.
